places.name: Chandigarh
places.description: Chandigarh is a modern city and the capital of two Indian states, Punjab and Haryana. It is known for its well-planned architecture and beautiful gardens.

places.name: Shimla
places.description: Shimla, the capital of Himachal Pradesh, is a popular hill station known for its colonial architecture and scenic beauty.

places.name: Manali
places.description: Manali is a famous hill station in Himachal Pradesh, known for its adventure activities, scenic landscapes, and temples.

places.name: Amritsar
places.description: Amritsar is a historic city in Punjab, famous for the Golden Temple and its rich cultural heritage.

places.name: Kasauli
places.description: Kasauli is a small hill station in Himachal Pradesh, known for its serene environment and lush greenery.

places.name: Dharamshala
places.description: Dharamshala is a picturesque hill station in Himachal Pradesh, known for being the residence of the Dalai Lama and its Tibetan culture.
